levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vup>shortens slightly</>, attacks prioritize enemies with long-ranged weapons, and becomes less likely to be targeted by enemies
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
